title: Ep. 3. Here There Be Gerblins - Chapter Three
description: With one half of their former employers effectively rescued, our party begins the hunt for Gundren Rockseeker in earnest. There are just a few things standing in their way: They don't know where he is, they're all Level Clown-Shoes, and also, a jelly monster.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
